verbose_text: Inviable cdc13Delta strains formed microcolonies, and the sizes of microcolonies were increased by nmd2Delta, exo1Delta, or rad24Delta mutations (XREF_FIG B and S2B), just as the deletions improved fitness of cdc13-1 cells at semipermissive temperatures (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: increased by nmd2Delta, exo1Delta, or rad24Delta mutations ( XREF_FIG B and S2B), just as the deletions improved fitness of cdc13-1
